description:
Exports: Supplementary unit

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
51000 Foreign trade

Definition:
In addition to the net mass, given in kilograms, information
on so-called supplementary units is collected for specific
eight-digit commodity codes of the Commodity Classification
for Foreign Trade Statistics. Supplementary units are, for
instance, litres or cubic metres. The commodity codes for
which, apart from mass, supplementary units are recorded,
can be seen in the Commodity Classification for Foreign
Trade Statistics.

name: Exports: Supplementary unit
